meanings.definition: A series of lectures or lessons in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: In school, students attend different courses to learn about various subjects.
meanings.sent2: She signed up for online courses to improve her skills in coding.
meanings.sent3: The buffet offered a course of delicious desserts after the main meal.
meanings.sent4: The river followed its natural course, winding through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The courses on gardening at the community center were informative and fun.

meanings.definition: A path or route taken by a vehicle, runner, or river.
meanings.sent1: The hiking trail led us through a scenic course in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The ship changed its course to avoid the stormy weather.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel swiftly navigated its course through the tree branches.
meanings.sent4: The car sped along the winding course of the mountain road.
meanings.sent5: The river's course meandered gently through the countryside.

meanings.definition: A dish served as one of the successive parts of a meal.
meanings.sent1: The main course of the dinner was a delicious steak with vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers a variety of courses, from appetizers to desserts.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected course of ice cream after the soup surprised the guests.
meanings.sent4: The chef's special course was a fusion of different culinary traditions.
meanings.sent5: The wedding reception featured a lavish course of seafood delicacies.
